pullrequest.title: Actor collisions as invisible box models that follow

content.raw:
@chapulina The collisions seem to work fine, though there is an issue with how the actors proceed with the trajectory when they cannot see the robot but still proceed. It pushes the robot crazy enough that the odometry is messed up.
  ![collision.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/gkR8znK/images/2244916009-collision.gif)
content.html: @chapulina The collisions seem to work fine, though there is an issue with how the actors proceed with the trajectory when they cannot see the robot but still proceed. It pushes the robot crazy enough that the odometry is messed up.
